law.catch_line: A State Record of Arrest and Prosecution ("RAP" sheet) that is accessible by judicial officers for p...
law.text:
A State Record of Arrest and Prosecution ("RAP" sheet) that is accessible by judicial officers for purposes of making pretrial release determinations shall prominently indicate, if applicable, that the individual who is the subject of the report is:
a registered sex offender; or
subject to a term of lifetime sexual offender supervision under Title 11, Subtitle 7 of this article.
